comment: Divisor of Fermat number (special form of Euler's result, see ~ fmtnofac1 ): Let F_n be a Fermat number. Let p be a prime divisor of F_n. Then p is in the form: k*2^(n+1)+1 where k is a positive integer. (Contributed by AV, 25-Jul-2021.)
